## Description {#details}

Represents a use of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a>.

This class holds an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a>, which records the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> being used and the result number, a pointer to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> using the value, and Next and Prev pointers, which link together all the uses of an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a>.

Definition at line 283 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
